description.en_US: Power up your devices with our 'Batteries' DPP template - effortlessly manage your battery inventory, ensuring uninterrupted performance and endless productivity whenever you need it most. Note that we only cover customer-facing mandatory attributes with this DPP family.

labels.en_US: ID of EU declaration of conformity
Impact of substances on the environment, human health, safety
Carbon footprint as declared (kg CO2e / 1 kWh of total energy)
Carbon footprint per the 4 life cycle stages (%)
Web link to public carbon footprint study
Information of the due diligence report
Pre-consumer recycled content share of Li/ Co/ Ni/ Pb
Post-consumer recycled content share of Li/ Co/ Ni/ Pb
Role of end-users in contributing to waste prevention
Role of end-users in contributing to the separate collection of waste batteries
Info on separate collection, take back and preparing for re-use/repurposing and recycling ops
Ratio between nominal allowed battery power (W) and battery energy (Wh)
Round trip energy efficiency at 50% of cycle life
Initial internal resistance on battery level (cell & pack)
Expected lifetime: Number of charge-discharge cycles
Date of putting the battery into service
